name: Weather Dashboard
description: Current weather and 5-day forecast with visual charts
author: Matrix OS
prompt: Build a weather dashboard app. Show current temperature, conditions, humidity, and wind speed at the top. Below that show a 5-day forecast as cards. Use a clean, modern design with weather icons. Include a search bar to change city. Use the OpenWeatherMap-style layout.

name: Snake
description: Classic snake game with arrow key controls
author: Matrix OS
prompt: Build a classic snake game. Use arrow keys to control direction. Snake grows when eating food (red dots). Score display at top. Game over on wall or self collision. Green snake on dark background. Include a restart button.

name: Habit Tracker
description: Daily habit tracking with streak visualization
author: Matrix OS
prompt: Build a habit tracker app. Users can add habits with names. Each habit shows a row of daily checkboxes for the current week. Completed days show green, missed show red. Track current streak count per habit. Clean minimal design. Data persists via OS bridge.

name: Markdown Preview
description: Live markdown editor with side-by-side preview
author: Matrix OS
prompt: Build a markdown editor with live preview. Split screen: left side is a textarea for markdown input, right side shows rendered HTML. Support headers, bold, italic, links, code blocks, and lists. Auto-update preview on input change.
